mapper.insert: insert into books(start_date, end_date, guests_num, request, user_id, room_id) values(#{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{guestsNum}, #{request}, #{userId}, #{roomId})
mapper.select: select b.book_id, u.name as user_name, u.phone_number as user_phone, u.email as email, r.name as room_name, b.start_date, b.end_date, b.guests_num, p.amount as amount, b.request, b.status, (SELECT file_url FROM image_files WHERE entity_id = b.room_id AND entity_type = 'rooms' ORDER BY uploaded_at ASC LIMIT 1) AS file_url from books b join users u on b.user_id = u.user_id join rooms r on b.room_id = r.room_id join payments p on p.book_id = b.book_id where b.book_id = #{bookId}

select b.book_id, u.name as user_name, u.phone_number as user_phone, b.start_date, b.end_date, b.request, b.status from books b join users u on b.user_id = u.user_id order by book_id limit #{size} offset #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM books b JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id WHERE 1=1
AND book_id = #{keyword} AND u.name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND u.phone_number like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND (start_date >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')) AND (STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= start_date) AND (end_date >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')) AND (STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= end_date)
AND status = #{statusFilter}
mapper.update: UPDATE books b JOIN rooms r ON r.name = #{roomName} SET b.start_date = #{startDate}, b.end_date = #{endDate}, b.guests_num = #{guestsNum}, b.request = #{request}, b.status = #{status}, b.room_id = r.room_id WHERE b.book_id = #{bookId};
mapper.select: select r.name as roomName, b.start_date, b.end_date, b.status from books b join rooms r on b.room_id = r.room_id where b.status in ('대기', '완료') and year(b.start_date) = #{year} and month(b.start_date) = #{month}

select b.start_date, r.name as roomName, u.name as userName, u.phone_number as phoneNumber, b.request from books b join rooms r on b.room_id = r.room_id join users u on b.user_id = u.user_id where b.status = '대기' and b.start_date > current_date() order by b.start_date;

select b.start_date, r.name as room_name, u.name as user_name, u.phone_number as user_phone, p.paid_at as paid_at, p.amount as amount, p.status as status from books b join users u on b.user_id = u.user_id join rooms r on b.room_id = r.room_id join payments p on p.book_id = b.book_id where b.start_date > current_date() order by b.start_date

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(start_date, '%a') AS day_of_week, -- 요일 약어 (Mon, Tue, ...) COUNT(*) AS reservation_count -- 예약 건수 FROM books GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(start_date, '%a') -- 요일별로 그룹화 ORDER BY reservation_count DESC -- 예약 건수가 많은 순서대로 정렬

SELECT r.address AS region, -- 숙박 시설의 지역 COUNT(b.book_id) AS reservation_count -- 예약 건수 FROM books b JOIN rooms r ON b.room_id = r.room_id -- rooms 테이블과 결합 GROUP BY r.address -- 지역별로 그룹화 ORDER BY reservation_count DESC -- 예약 건수가 많은 순서대로 정렬 LIMIT 5; -- 상위 5개 지역만 표시
